member.summary: Simple factory for creating database dialect providers. No caching needed - these are lightweight objects.

member.summary: Infers the dialect type from SqlDefine characteristics.

member.returns: The created dialect provider.

member.name: T:Sqlx.IDatabaseDialectProvider
member.summary: Provides database-specific SQL generation and syntax handling.

member.summary: Gets the SQL definition for this dialect.

member.name: P:Sqlx.IDatabaseDialectProvider.DialectType
member.summary: Gets the dialect type.

member.name: M:Sqlx.IDatabaseDialectProvider.GenerateLimitClause(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Generates a LIMIT clause for pagination.
member.param: The maximum number of rows to return.
The number of rows to skip.
member.returns: The SQL LIMIT clause.

member.name: M:Sqlx.IDatabaseDialectProvider.GenerateInsertWithReturning(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Generates an INSERT statement with RETURNING clause for getting the inserted ID.
member.returns: The SQL INSERT statement with RETURNING clause.

member.name: M:Sqlx.IDatabaseDialectProvider.GenerateBatchInsert(System.String,System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a batch INSERT statement optimized for the specific database.
member.returns: The SQL batch INSERT statement.

member.summary: Generates an UPSERT (INSERT ... ON CONFLICT UPDATE) statement.
member.param: The key columns for conflict detection.
member.returns: The SQL UPSERT statement.

member.name: M:Sqlx.IDatabaseDialectProvider.GetDatabaseTypeName(System.Type)
member.summary: Converts a .NET type to the appropriate database type name.
member.returns: The database-specific type name.

member.summary: Formats a date/time value for the specific database.
member.returns: The formatted date/time string.

member.summary: Gets the syntax for getting the current date/time.
member.returns: The SQL expression for current date/time.

member.name: M:Sqlx.IDatabaseDialectProvider.GetConcatenationSyntax(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the syntax for string concatenation.
member.returns: The SQL string concatenation expression.

member.returns: A comma-separated string of wrapped column names.

member.summary: Creates a parameter placeholder with the appropriate prefix.
member.returns: The parameter placeholder with prefix.

member.summary: Creates multiple parameter placeholders with the appropriate prefix.
member.returns: An array of parameter placeholders with prefix.

member.summary: Creates a comma-separated list of parameter placeholders.

member.summary: Creates SET clauses for UPDATE statements from a collection.

member.returns: A comma-separated string of SET clauses.

member.summary: Creates WHERE conditions for SQL statements.

member.returns: A string of WHERE conditions joined with AND.

member.summary: Creates WHERE conditions for SQL statements from a collection.
member.param: The collection of column names to create WHERE conditions for.
member.returns: A string of WHERE conditions joined with AND.

member.summary: Simple type analyzer for source generation. Focus on ADO.NET types. Cache APIs are retained as no-ops for test compatibility.

member.summary: Determines if a type is likely an entity type.

member.summary: Determines if a type is a collection type (cached).

member.summary: Extracts entity type from generic collections or Task types (cached).

member.name: M:Sqlx.TypeAnalyzer.IsAsyncType(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol)
member.summary: Determines if a type is async (Task or Task<T>) (cached).

member.name: M:Sqlx.TypeAnalyzer.GetInnerType(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol)
member.summary: Gets the inner type of Task<T> or returns the original type.

member.name: M:Sqlx.TypeAnalyzer.IsScalarReturnType(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if a method returns a scalar value (cached).

member.name: M:Sqlx.TypeAnalyzer.GetDefaultValue(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol)
member.summary: Gets a default value expression for a type (cached).

member.name: M:Sqlx.TypeAnalyzer.IsSystemNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a namespace is a system namespace (cached).
